Warnings Warnings 1.Please check the validity of your proof before claim. The customer service will evaluate based on your claim materials.\n 2.You can only submit one claim, please don\'t submit the same claim twice.\n 3.After submit of the claim, please wait for customer service.
Seller offers tokens, buyer buy tokens with Fiat. 1.Buyer\'s remittance will go directly to seller\'s account,the digital assets under sold by seller will be entrusted to the platform during the transaction.\n 2.Please complete the payment within the specified time. Please click the "paid" after payment. After seller confirms receipt of the payment. The system will transfer the digital assets to your account.\n 3.If buyer doesn\'t pay or click "Already paid" button within 15 mins, the order will be canceled due to overtime,the loss will be born by buyer.\n 4.If the buyer doesn\'t receive the digital assets within 24h, please submit a claim in the platform, the customer service will handle it within one day; if the buyer already paid, the digital assets will be transferred to buyer; otherwise, the buyer\'s account will be suspended.\n 5.You can only submit one claim per order, please cautiously submit relevant materials. Only the party starts the claim can cancel it.\n 6.If the buyer cancels the order three times within one day,his purchasing function will be limited during the day.

Successful cache purging Please enter id number Press exit procedure again To set Commission Mining Dividend My right Invitation Bonus Rules Registration bonus 288 MVS, invitation bonus 100MVS each. You can also enjoy commission to the transaction fee of your friends invited. Total amount received Mining Rules All users can participate in trading mining. The platform will calculate the transaction fees generated by users daily. Based on the average MVS price during the period, and convert the 100% transaction fee into MVS, then deliver to the users’ exchange account the next day. MVS average price = total MVS transaction volume in the statistical period / total MVS transaction amount in the statistical period The dividends are distributed once a day Date Currency Dividend amount Total dividend Dividend Rules Basic dividend and equity dividend: 1. Equity Dividend Qualification: All MV users with transaction volume exceeds 100,000 USDT can enjoy equity dividend. 2. Basic Dividend Qualification: VIP member will automatically be granted basic dividend qualificaiton. For users with dividend qualification, each 10,000 MVS will be deemed as one dividend right, and the odds are not counted. The formula for calculating: 40% of the total transaction fee per day / the dividend right (the number of qualified users: Basic + Equity) = daily dividend. usable freeze total Wallet Address: Transfer to pass card account The cumulative invited person Activity rules Invitation code Referral links 1. After the friend accepts the invitation, an OTC order will generate a proportional reward for each true transaction. 2. Reward to your OTC account in the form of USDT or ACN. 3. The platform will settle the reward at 11:30 every night, and the reward will be paid to your account in one time. The amount of the reward is subject to the actual amount. 4. Only OTC transactions participate in the activity, while other transactions do not. 5. If the inviter violates the relevant risk control rules of the invitation reward, the service fee will not be returned to the inviter, and the inviter and the inviter will face the risk of sealing their names. In case of any adjustment of activities, tianfu tiancheng trading platform shall prevail, and the final interpretation right belongs to tianfu tiancheng trading platform. Note: the inviter can get 30 OTC trading rewards accumulatively. awarded： Invitee s account number trading hour Reward type amount of bonus name the latest price PriceChangeRatio
